definition: computer numerical control machine tool (CNC machine tool)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: In chapter 4, the experiment of temperature-thermal Errors of CNC machine tools is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，主要论述了数控机床热误差实验。

sentences.english: The obvious regional also reflects the imbalance in the development of CNC machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 地域性的明显也反应了我国数控机床发展的不均衡。

sentences.english: When I go into the workshop, I will teach you how to operate an NC machine.
sentences.chinese: 当我走进车间时，我将要教会你们如何操作数控机床。

sentences.english: Strong technical force, with the most advanced computer equipment, numerical control machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 技术力量雄厚，拥有最有先进的电脑设备，数控机床。

sentences.english: So for high precision CNC machine tools, the collision must be eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 所以对于高精度数控机床来说，碰撞绝对要杜绝。

sentences.english: Presents a model of 3-axis CNC, establishment comprehensive error model.
sentences.chinese: 以三轴数控机床为对象，建立综合误差模型。

sentences.english: Used for zero position correction of CNC machine tool and signal division.
sentences.chinese: 用于数控机床零位补正和信号分割。

sentences.english: In this paper, a new method of machining equidistant profile axes using numerically-controlled machine tool is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了在数控机床上铣削等距型面轴的新方法。

sentences.english: The output of NC machine tools of important enterprises is increasing double and redouble.
sentences.chinese: 国内重点骨干企业金切机床厂数控机床产量成倍增长。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a method of machining shaped Profile Connector on NC machines.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了在数控机床上加工型面联结体的方法。

sentences.english: Useful for computing gear parameters even if you do not have CNC machines.
sentences.chinese: 有用的计算齿轮参数，即使您没有数控机床。

sentences.english: Numerical control machine tool servo system of general structure.
sentences.chinese: 数控机床伺服系统的一般结构。

sentences.english: Self-centering hydraulic power chuck is an accessory of CNC(Computer Numerical Control) machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 自定心液压动力卡盘是数控机床的功能部件。

sentences.english: The shape of the ball screws were detailed elaborated which was fit for the NC machine for high speed.
sentences.chinese: 详细阐述了适合高速化数控机床的滚珠丝杠副形式。

sentences.english: It is difficult to find the causes of failure for the mechanical fault maintenance of CNC machine.
sentences.chinese: 数控机床机械故障维修的难点是查找故障产生的原因。

sentences.english: As this is a CNC machine, it does not require any punch or mould.
sentences.chinese: 由于这是一个数控机床，它不需要任何冲头或模具。
